result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael L. Fitzgerald was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant was ordered to report immediately to the probation and parole office.

miscConds.notes: Defendant is ordered to pay the DNA surcharge, and to make arrangements to provide a DNA sample, within 48 hours, for testing through the Clark County Sheriff Department or if on probation, to the Department of Corrections as is required in all criminal convictions.

Defendant shall attend counseling, treatments, programming, evaluations as deemed appropriate by the agent releasing all records to the agent upon request  The defendant is ordered to participate in Anger Management Counseling reporting the results of the same to the agent.

The defendant shall have no contact with Dennis Widmann or Logan Widmann  of any kind, whether direct or indirect, including in person, in writing, by phone, by e-mail or other electronic means, through a third party or in any other way.  Defendant is not to be on or around the property of W482 Century Road, Spencer WI 54479
The defendant shall pay Department of Correction fees as directed by the agent.
Fine and/or costs to be paid on a schedule established by the agent.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael L. Fitzgerald

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

Waived reading of the complaint  THE DEFENDANT ENTERED A PLEA OF NOT GUILTY  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 12, 2016 at 11:00 am.
